text:
Need to write a basic GUI to run Myrmidon that is similar to the JUnit 
SwingTestRunner. It needs to have a way to 
* choose particular build file
* browse & execute targets in build file
* reload typelibs/base ExecutionFrame each run or not
* see output of particular project/target/task (or maybe this will come out at 
console underneath)
creator: donaldp@apache.org
